span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: BREAKFASTS AND LUNCHES WILL BE SERVED DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: SCHOOL CLOSURE MEALS UPDATE ---- Monday/Thursday Pickup ONLY

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We respectfully ask that people attempt to follow the schedule below understanding that it may not always work for everyone:

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: People with last names that begin with A-

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: People with last names that begin with

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: People with last names that begin with

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This may help prevent the back up of cars on Maple Avenue and reduce the wait time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you for having patience as you pick up your meals.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Roboto;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WILL BREAKFAST AND LUNCH BE SERVED DURING THE SCHOOL SHUTDOWN?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Yes! Grab & Go Breakfast and Lunches will be served at Dodd Middle School on a first come first served basis. Signs will direct you to the kitchen side of the school and you can remain in your vehicle. During inclement weather, you may need to park and receive meals at the door.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WHO CAN GET BREAKFAST AND LUNCH EACH DAY?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Free Breakfast and Lunch is available to all Cheshire Public School district children and other resident children, 18 years of age and under.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WHERE WILL THE MEALS BE SERVED EACH DAY?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Grab & Go meals will be served at Dodd Middle School, 100 Park Place.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WHO CAN PICK UP THE MEALS?

p.style: margin-right: 0; text-align: left;

div.p: Meals may be picked up by parents/guardians; children DO NOT need to be present.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WHEN WILL THE MEALS BE SERVED?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Starting Wednesday, March 18, 2020 until further notice. Meals will be served between 9:30 AM and 12:30 PM on Mondays, Wednesdays, & Fridays.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: There is no charge for children 18 and under. We can no longer offer meals to adults as we cannot take payment.

small.style: display: block; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will vary each day. Sample menu items are Banana Bread, Cinnamon Stick, Yogurt, Muffins, Mini Pancakes and cold Cereal. See Breakfast menu. The breakfast includes an 8 oz milk, 4 oz 100% fruit juice and chilled fresh or canned fruit.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: will vary each day. Menu choices include Turkey and Cheese, Ham and Cheese, Tuna Salad Sandwiches, and Chicken Salad Sandwiches on whole grain rolls. Pizza Munachables and Nacho box are sample menu choices. See Lunch Menu. All Sandwiches will have lettuce. Condiments will be included. The Sandwiches will be accompanied by two vegetables of the day (Baby carrots, pepper or other veggie sticks, cold veggies in dressing, veggie dragon juice, vegetable salads etc.), fruit, milk, utensils, and napkins.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto;

em.strong: Note - To ensure everyone's health and safety, our staff will be placing your requested meals in the trunk of your vehicle. Please help us by ensuring that there is sufficient space in your trunk when you arrive. Thank You.

p.style: text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: text-align: center;

div.p: You may receive Monday’s lunch through Thursday’s breakfast.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: You may receive Thursday’s lunch through Monday’s breakfast.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; text-decoration: underline;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: WHO DO I CONTACT WITH QUESTIONS?

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please contact the Cheshire Food and Nutrition Service Office at 203-250-2459 with any questions regarding allergies or special diets.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: text-decoration: underline;

p.style: text-align: center;
